GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: force data bouncing when backend is untrusted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.251 by commit 981de55fb6b5253fa7ae345827c6c3ca77912e5c. For more details please see the references link.
